ttp_template:
<group name="address_name_query_id_query_time">
Query ID: {{QUERY_ID | ORPHRASE}}
Server:  {{SERVER | ORPHRASE}}
Address:  {{SERVER_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
Name:  {{NAME | ORPHRASE}}
Address 1: {{ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
Query time: {{QUERY_TIME | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Query ID: 0x0001
Server:    8.8.8.8
Address:   8.8.8.8#53

Name:      example.com
Address 1: 93.184.216.34
Query time: 12 msec
textfsm_template:
Value QUERY_ID (0x[0-9A-Fa-f]+)
Value SERVER (\S+)
Value SERVER_ADDRESS (\S+\#\d+)
Value NAME (\S+)
Value ADDRESS (\S+)
Value QUERY_TIME (\d+ msec)

Start
  ^Query ID:\s+${QUERY_ID}\s*$$
  ^Server:\s+${SERVER}\s*$$
  ^Address:\s+${SERVER_ADDRESS}\s*$$
  ^Name:\s+${NAME}\s*$$
  ^Address\s+\d+:\s+${ADDRESS}\s*$$
  ^Query time:\s+${QUERY_TIME}\s*$$ -> Record
